name: Symbol search
description: Search symbols in ASCII and Unicode. Enter to copy the symbol, alt+enter to copy the HTML entity. Dark mode friendly.

preferences.name: Result limit
preferences.description: Number of results that should be returned.

preferences.name: Minimum score
preferences.description: Only display results with a matching score higher than this. If too high, e.g. higher than 200, no results will be shown.

preferences.name: Symbol
preferences.description: Search symbols in ASCII and Unicode. Enter to copy the symbol, alt+enter to copy the HTML entity. Dark mode friendly.

preferences.name: Update interval
preferences.description: Time interval (in days) after which the cached list of unicode symbols is updated by downloading the newest list. Set to -1 to never update the list.
